title: OG-RAG: Ontology-Grounded Retrieval-Augmented Generation For Large Language Models
details: K Sharma, P Kumar, Y Li - arXiv preprint arXiv:2412.15235, 2024
abstract: This paper presents OG-RAG, an Ontology-Grounded Retrieval Augmented Generation method designed to enhance LLM-generated responses by anchoring retrieval processes in domain-specific ontologies. While LLMs are widely used for …
